title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Deepening Mathematical Concepts Through Reflective Abstraction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Foundational Theories in Mathematics Education
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can hierarchically analyze three or more mathematical concepts using reflective abstraction (COA and AOC)
Learners can verbalize mathematical thinking processes and explain them through concrete examples

Learners will receive three or more peer feedback sessions and write five or more self-reflection journals within one month, improve two or more concept-learning strategies, and submit a one-page document detailing the refined strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
